featured_entries.title: The Origin of Lake Toba
featured_entries.description: Once upon a time there was a young farmer named Toba. He lived in a fertile valley, therefore he was able to support his lonely, humble life with the crops he grew.

featured_entries.title: Begu Ganjang
featured_entries.description: Begu Ganjang described as a supernatural figure who has a very terrible form. That said, he has a tall and large body. Long hair with a scary face. In fact, according to the legend that is told, begu ganjang can change itself bigger and higher.

featured_entries.title: An Unpublished Batak Creation Legend
featured_entries.description: "I fold my hands respectfully above my head, O gods on high!" "Seven times pardon, lord, for naming thy name,"
